Sisters In Cash

About

Business Podcast

This business podcast offers valuable insights and advice for entrepreneurs, business owners, and industry professionals.

Each episode features expert guests who share their experiences out of their real life and knowledge on a range of topics, including marketing, finance, leadership, social media and more. Whether you're just starting out or looking to take your business to the next level, this podcast provides practical tips and strategies to help you succeed in today's competitive market. Tune in to gain valuable insights and stay ahead of the game.

This business podcast is hosted by Viking Vanity, a mainstream Model, YouTuber and Sales Manager, with more than 10 years experience in Social Media.

Listen

Latest Episode

New Episode Out Now!

Lina Marxsen reveals how adult creators can work smarter and not harder, by organizing and recycling content the right way. From strategic folder systems to scaling with AI and protecting your legal rights in Germany, this episode is packed with real talk, revenue tips, and sustainable growth strategies.

Ready to stop burning out and start earning smarter? Tune in now — featured by LegalFans & 4based.

Community

Join the inner circle

This is the place where real conversations happen.

Our private community is where top creators and industry peers share unfiltered insights, legal tips, monetization wins — and the hard lessons no one talks about publicly. If you’re serious about protecting your content, growing sustainably, and staying ahead in this fast-moving industry, this is where you need to be.

Access is limited. Join today and stay in the know!

Join the Network

Events & Collabs

Let's hook up

Our Podcast goes beyond the mic!

You'll find us at industry events, creator meetups and private networking circles - connecting with like-minded peers and forward thinking brands. We'are always open to collaborating on future panels or co-hosted experiences that bring real value to our comunity.

Have an event in mind or want to partner up? Let's make it happen - we'd love to hear from you
